doc:
Raymond St. Jacques https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_St._Jacques 0 Raymond St. Jacques (March 1, 1930 – August 27, 1990) was an American actor, director and producer. He was the first African American actor to appear in a regular role on a western series, playing Simon Blake on Rawhide. Raymond_St._Jacques ( March_1_,_1930 – August_27_,_1990 ) was an_American_actor , director_and_producer . He was the_first_African_American_actor to_appear in a_regular_role on a_western_series , playing Simon_Blake on Rawhide .
